title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-3.4 - Responsibilities of clinical laboratories
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-3.4 - Responsibilities of clinical laboratories

State Regulations

Clinical laboratories shall: (a) report immediately any initially reactive HBsAg test result from a blood specimen marked "mother/delivery" to the requesting health care provider or health care facility; and
(b) report any positive HBsAg test result to the local health officer within 24 hours (see section
2102
of the Public Health Law). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
69-3.4

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
